entries: The avarek withdraws beneath its spines, presenting a defensive, spiky exterior. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to spine {@action Strike||Strikes} and AC. Any adjacent creature that attempts a melee attack against the avarek takes {@damage 1d6} piercing damage per attack, regardless of whether the attack hits. Prickly Defense lasts until the avarek uses a move action or makes a {@action Strike} with any weapon other than its spines.
bot.name: Prickly Defense

entries: The avarek curls into a ball and rolls rapidly, impaling enemies with its spines. The avarek {@action Stride||Strides} twice and makes up to two spine {@action Strike||Strikes} at any point during its movement, each against a different target within reach. These attacks count toward the avarek's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the avarek makes all the attacks.
bot.name: Rolling Assault

entries: The avarek's {@action Strike||Strikes} deal an additional {@damage 2d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

attacks.name: jaws
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d10+10} piercing plus fill lungs and paralysis

mid.trigger: A creature {@condition grabbed} by the barnacle ghoul critically fails a skill check to {@action Escape}
entries: The barnacle ghoul makes a claw {@action Strike} against the triggering creature.
mid.name: Tear Flesh

bot.requirements: The barnacle ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour.
entries: The barnacle ghoul regains {@dice 5d6} Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.
bot.name: Consume Flesh

stages.entry: drowning and cannot reduce below stage 4 until the water is purged {@action Administer First Aid} (which stops the creature from drowning and returns the creature to stage 3; stage 2 on a critical success) or a {@trait magical} effect that removes curses or the {@condition sickened} condition (which stops the creature from drowning and ends the curse). If the creature dies from drowning, it rises as a barnacle ghoul the next midnight.

entries: The barnacle ghoul Swims up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
bot.name: Nimble Swim

entries: See Ghoul Abilities; DC 26.
bot.name: Paralysis

creature.name: Bloody Berleth
items: heavy crossbow (with 4 spellstrike arrows [type III, blindness; DC 24])
+1 striking shovel (same stats as a scythe, but with the versatile B trait)

bot.requirements: Berleth has just used his shovel to {@action Trip} a creature
entries: Berleth brutally brings his shovel down on the {@condition prone} foe, making a shovel {@action Strike}. On a hit, the {@action Strike} deals damage as normal, plus the target must make a DC 30 Fortitude save.

entries.Critical Failure: The creature is {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 2} and {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1} for 1 minute.

bot.name: Concussive Beatdown

entries: Berleth plunges his shovel through a creature's neck as though it were peat moss. He makes a shovel {@action Strike} against an adjacent {@condition unconscious} or {@condition immobilized} creature. On a hit, the creature is {@condition wounded|CRB|wounded 2} (possibly {@condition dying}).
bot.name: Decapitate

entries: Berleth makes a final shovel {@action Strike} before {@condition dying}.
bot.name: Final Blow

entries: The bregdi can breathe air for up to 10 minutes, or up to an hour so long as its skin remains wet.
top.name: Partial Amphibian

entries: The bregdi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an {@skill Athletics} check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the bregdi) or the pilot's {@skill Lore||Sailing Lore} DC, whichever is higher.
bot.name: Capsize

entries: Medium, {@damage 2d8+7} bludgeoning, Rupture 18.
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: The bregdi pulls a creature it can reach or a creature holding something it can reach (such as a fishing line in the water). The bregdi attempts an {@skill Athletics} check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, it pulls the creature into an adjacent space. On a critical success, the bregdi can also make a jaws {@action Strike} against the creature pulled into an adjacent space.
bot.name: Tug

bot.requirements: The casino bouncer has {@ability Grab||Grabbed} a {@trait Medium} or smaller target and is wielding a nonlethal weapon in the other hand
entries: The casino bouncer makes a {@action Strike} against the {@condition grabbed} target with the nonlethal weapon. If the Strike hits, it deals damage as usual and the casino bouncer moves the target 5 feet (this is forced movement) and Steps into the space the target had just occupied.
bot.name: Escort from the Premises

entries: The casino bouncer attempts to {@action Demoralize} a creature with a mere glance. The casino bouncer doesn't take a penalty to their {@skill Intimidation} check if the target doesn't speak the same language. If the bouncer rolls a critical success, the target can't reduce the value of its {@condition frightened} condition until {@dice 1d4} rounds have passed.
bot.name: Intimidating Stare

creature.name: Diobel Sweeper Tough
items: sling (with 3 spellstrike bullets [type I, magic missile]

entries: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee {@action Strike} against a {@condition frightened} creature, the {@action Strike} deals an extra weapon die of damage.
bot.name: Bullyrag Beatdown

entries: When the gang tough's {@action Strike} with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 1}.
bot.name: Frightening Critical

entries: The Diobel Sweeper tough Interacts to draw a bomb, then {@action Strike||Strikes} with it.
bot.name: Quick Bomber

entries: The eberark utters crude insults and growls threateningly. Each creature within 30 feet must attempt a DC 27 Will save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

entries.Failure: The creature is {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 2} and {@condition paralyzed} for 1 round.
entries.Critical Failure: The creature is {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 4} and {@condition paralyzed} for {@dice 1d4} rounds.

bot.name: Arrogant Taunts

entries: A creature hit by the eberark's spit becomes coated in a slippery, flammable oil. The creature must succeed at a DC 27 Reflex save or become {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 2} for as long as they are coated in incendiary spit. Creatures affected by incendiary spit that take fire damage catch fire, taking {@damage 3d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage}. Once this {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage} ends, the spit has burned away.
The spit also wears off naturally after one hour or can be washed off with soap, water, and one minute of work.
bot.name: Incendiary Spit

entries: The eberark {@action Stride||Strides} twice, leaving a trail of magical fire behind it as it moves. Squares the eberark moves through catch fire, creating a 5-foot-tall wall of flame that burns for 1 round. The wall of flame conceals creatures and objects on the other side of it. Any creature that enters or starts its turn in the wall of flame takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage (DC 27 basic Reflex save).
bot.name: Trail of Flame

creature.name: Franca Laurentz
items: +1 striking crossbow (with 3 shining bolts and 2 explosive bolts)

mid.trigger: The attack roll for a {@action Strike} targeting Franca fails or critically fails
entries: Franca can choose to either {@action Step} or redirect the attack to a creature that is adjacent to her and within the reach of the triggering attack. The attacker rerolls the {@action Strike}'s attack roll against the new target.
mid.name: Deflective Dodge

entries: Franca quickly slashes at nearby foes, aiming to maim rather than disable. She makes up to three melee {@action Strike||Strikes}, each against a different creature within reach. These {@action Strike||Strikes} count toward Franca's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all three {@action Strike||Strikes} are made. On a hit, the {@action Strike} deals 3 {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage} instead of its normal damage. On a critical hit, the creature is {@condition flat-footed} until the beginning of Franca's next turn or until they spend an action to remove the condition, whichever comes first.
bot.name: Bloody Rebel

bot.requirements: Franca's last action was a melee {@action Strike} that dealt sneak attack damage to a {@condition flat-footed} target
entries: Franca deals 6 {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage} to the target creature, and the target is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1}.
bot.name: Hamstring

entries: Franca's {@action Strike||Strikes} deal an additional {@damage 3d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: Franca uncorks and flings a dose of poison at a bleeding foe. She retrieves a poison from her inventory, then splashes it at a creature within 10 feet that is currently taking {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage}. The creature must succeed at a DC 32 Reflex save or be exposed to the poison.
bot.name: Splash Poison

abilities: +2 circumstance bonus to saves vs. poison

creature.name: Gage Carlyle
items: +2 greater striking hand crossbow with 10 bolts

entries: When Gage gets a critical success using the {@action Lie} action, the target's attitude toward him improves by one step, as though he'd succeeded at using {@skill Diplomacy} to {@action Make an Impression}. This works only once per conversation, and if he critically succeeds against multiple targets using the same result, he chooses one creature's attitude to improve. To use this ability, Gage must be lying to impart seemingly important information, inflate his status, or ingratiate himself, which trivial or irrelevant lies can't achieve.
bot.name: Charming Liar

entries: When Gage meets a group of up to five people, he can immediately attempt a {@skill Diplomacy} check to {@action Make an Impression}, comparing the result to the Will DC of each target. He takes a –3 penalty on this check, and it is possible to get different degrees of success for each target. If he fails or critically fails, he can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.
bot.name: Smooth Operator

mid.trigger: The Iroran skeleton is critically hit
mid.name: Collapse

entries: Iroran skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals damage for a hit, rather than a critical hit. The skeleton can reform in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is {@condition immobilized} and {@condition flat-footed}.
mid.name: The

entries: As the monk's {@action Flurry of Blows} class feature. The Iroran skeleton makes two claw {@action Strike||Strikes}.
If both hit the same creature, the damage is combined for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. The multiple attack penalty applies to the {@action Strike||Strikes} as normal.
bot.name: Flurry of Claws
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Flurry of Claws As the monk's {@action Flurry of Blows} class feature.' in Iroran Skeleton, p.52

entries: As the monk feat. The Iroran skeleton can {@action Stride} along vertical surfaces, such as walls, as long as it begins and ends its movement on a horizontal surface.
bot.name: Wall Run
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Wall Run As the monk feat.' in Iroran Skeleton, p.52

entries: As the monk feat. The Iroran skeleton can {@action Stride} across liquid surfaces. If it ends its movement on a liquid surface, it falls in as normal.
bot.name: Water Step
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Water {@action Step} As the monk feat.' in Iroran Skeleton, p.52

entries: The Iroran skeleton makes a single {@action Strike} and compares the result to the AC of all creatures within its reach, dealing damage to each creature hit.
bot.name: Whirlwind Kick

mid.trigger: A creature misses two consecutive melee {@action Strike||Strikes} against Maurrisa
entries: Maurrisa takes advantage of a flailing foe's opening. She can either {@action Step} 5 feet or make a melee {@action Strike} against the triggering creature.
mid.name: Duck and Weave

mid.trigger: Maurrisa can make an {@action Attack of Opportunity}
entries: Maurrisa chops her opponent on the back of the head or neck, possibly concussing them. The target must attempt a DC 26 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature takes damage as if hit by Maurrisa's fist {@action Strike}, and is {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the creature is {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 3} instead.
mid.name: Rabbit Punch

abilities: +1 status bonus to saves vs. {@trait incapacitation} effects
+2 status bonus to saves vs. {@action Shove} and {@action Trip}

entries: A ravenile can hold their breath for 20 minutes.
top.name: Deep Breath

bot.requirements: The ravenile's regeneration is currently active
entries: The ravenile regains 20 HP.
bot.name: Forced Regeneration

bot.requirements: The ravenile's regeneration is currently deactivated
entries: The ravenile makes a melee {@action Strike}. This counts as two attacks for the ravenile's multiple attack penalty. If this {@action Strike} hits, the ravenile deals an extra die of weapon damage and the target falls {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Furious Wallop

bot.requirements: Scathka hasn't acted yet on their turn
entries: On their turn, Scathka casts one spell they've prepared and already cast this day without spending a spell slot. Scathka must still {@action Cast a Spell||Cast the Spell} and meet the spell's other requirements.
bot.name: Drain Wand

entries: Scathka draws a shadowy glyph on the dagger's blade and flings it at a nearby foe. Scathka makes a ranged {@action Strike} with the dagger with the range increment increased to 30 feet. If the {@action Strike} hits, it deals {@damage 8d6} cold damage (double damage on a critical success) and the target must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or be {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} until the end of its next turn (or {@dice 1d4} rounds on a critical failure). The dagger loses its shadowy magic as soon as the attack is resolved.
bot.name: Throw Shadow Blade

entries: Shikwashim mercenary can hold their breath for 20 minutes.
top.name: Deep Breath A

entries: With a sharp whistle or wave of their hand, the mercenary distracts an opponent so one of the mercenary's allies can land a clean blow. The mercenary chooses a target and an ally, both of whom must be within 30 feet of the mercenary. The target is {@condition flat-footed} against the first {@action Strike} the mercenary's ally makes on its next turn; if the ally doesn't {@action Strike} that target, the effect is lost. Depending on how the mercenary distracts their foe, this action gains either the {@trait auditory} or {@trait visual} trait.
bot.name: Coordinated Distraction

entries: Shikwashim mercenary's multiple attack penalty for attacks against humans is –3 (–2 with an agile weapon) on their second attack per turn or –6 (–4 with an agile weapon) on their third or subsequent attack per turn.
bot.name: Human Hunter A

entries: The Shikwashim mercenary makes a melee {@action Strike}. If it hits, it deals an extra die of damage.
This counts as two attacks for the mercenary's multiple attack penalty.
bot.name: Powerful Swipe

entries: Non-lizardfolk creatures in {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a {@action Swim} speed are {@condition flat-footed} to a Shikwashim mercenary.
bot.name: Terrain Advantage

entries: The svartalfar killer fades into shadow, {@action Stride||Strides} up to twice its Speed, and reforms. This movement doesn't trigger reactions, but the svartalfar killer must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness.
bot.name: Shadow Step

entries: A svartalfar killer deals an extra {@damage 2d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: The svartalfar killer chooses {@spell acid splash}, {@spell produce flame}, {@spell ray of enfeeblement}, or {@spell shocking grasp} and makes a melee {@action Strike}. If the svartalfar killer hits, they cast the chosen spell through the weapon at the same target. The spell's attack roll is the same result as the {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Spell-Imbued Blade

attacks.name: moderate acid flask
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid} plus 2 acid splash

attacks.name: moderate alchemist's fire
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d8} fire plus 2 {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire} and 2 fire splash

bot.requirements: The chemist has at least one bomb in their possession
entries: The chemist adds a hasty mix of noxious substances to the bomb and makes a ranged {@action Strike} with it. If it hits and deals damage, the target must attempt a DC 27 Fortitude save or become {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} for {@dice 1d6} rounds; if the result of the save is a critical failure, this increases to {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 3}. For the next 24 hours, the affected target takes a –2 circumstance penalty (–3 on a critical failure) to additional Fortitude saving throws against the same chemist's Crude Bombs.
bot.name: Dirty Bomb

bot.requirements: The chemist has their alchemist's tools, formula book, and a free hand
entries: The chemist creates a moderate acid flask or alchemist's fire that they must use before the end of their next turn or else it becomes inert.
bot.name: Quick Brew

entries: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee {@action Strike} against a {@condition frightened} creature, the {@action Strike} deals an extra weapon die of damage.
bot.name: Bullyrag Beatdown

entries: When the gang tough's {@action Strike} with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes {@condition frightened|CRB|frightened 1}.
bot.name: Frightening Critical

entries: The Washboard Dog scrapes their weapon up and down their washboard shield, making such a clatter that it's hard to hear anything over the din. Until the beginning of the Washboard Dog tough's next turn, all creatures within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to any saves to resist auditory spells or abilities.
bot.name: Scraping Clamor
